title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Aquatic Park and Municipal Pier
directions: located at the western end of Fisherman's Wharf
content: This area was once part of Fort Mason but is now a complex for museums and artisans, and a great place to take a break from the bustle of Fisherman's Wharf. There is a small beach at the foot of the park where you'll see kayakers, kite fliers, swimmers from the nearby Polar Bear Club, and even rock sculptors at work. At the end of the park is Municipal Pier —  the closest you can get to Alcatraz on foot or bike. After dark it can be a bit desolate.
